mapper.select: select id, organize_name, organize_type, staff_id, staff_name, vacate_type, vacate_reason, start_time, end_time, count_time, audit_staff, is_approve, comment from vacate_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into vacate_info(organize_name, organize_type, staff_id, staff_name, vacate_type, vacate_reason, start_time, end_time, count_time, audit_staff, is_approve, comment) values (#{organizeName}, #{organizeType}, #{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{vacateType}, #{vacateReason}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{countTime}, #{auditStaff}, #{isApprove}, #{comment})

insert into vacate_info(organize_name, organize_type, staff_id, staff_name, vacate_type, vacate_reason, start_time, end_time, count_time, audit_staff, is_approve, comment) values
(#{entity.organizeName}, #{entity.organizeType}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.staffName}, #{entity.vacateType}, #{entity.vacateReason}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.countTime}, #{entity.auditStaff}, #{entity.isApprove}, #{entity.comment})

insert into vacate_info(organize_name, organize_type, staff_id, staff_name, vacate_type, vacate_reason, start_time, end_time, count_time, audit_staff, is_approve, comment) values
(#{entity.organizeName}, #{entity.organizeType}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.staffName}, #{entity.vacateType}, #{entity.vacateReason}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.countTime}, #{entity.auditStaff}, #{entity.isApprove}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update organize_name = values(organize_name), organize_type = values(organize_type), staff_id = values(staff_id), staff_name = values(staff_name), vacate_type = values(vacate_type), vacate_reason = values(vacate_reason), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), count_time = values(count_time), audit_staff = values(audit_staff), is_approve = values(is_approve), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update vacate_info
organize_name = #{organizeName},
organize_type = #{organizeType},
staff_id = #{staffId},
staff_name = #{staffName},
vacate_type = #{vacateType},
vacate_reason = #{vacateReason},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
count_time = #{countTime},
audit_staff = #{auditStaff},
is_approve = #{isApprove},
comment = #{comment},
where id = #{id}
